Plot: A disturbing, darkly comic tale of a man who attempts to sever all contact with the outside world, by simply staying at home. As Gerald Ballantyne rids himself of the surface clutter in his...
Title: Home
Writer: J.G. Ballard (short story), Richard Curson Smith (adaptation)
Actors: Antony Sher, Matilda Ziegler, Deborah Findlay, Guy Henry
